alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Tallapoosa County through 645 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ridge Grove, or 8 miles north of Camp Hill. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dadeville and Camp Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
